mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBL_NOTICE
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBL_BOARD
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBL_ISSUE

SELECT A.* FROM( SELECT @ROWNUM := @ROWNUM + 1 AS NUM, BRDNO, BRDTYPE, BRDTITLE, BRDWRITER, DATE_FORMAT(BRDDATE,'%Y-%m-%d') BRDDATE, BRDHIT , CASE WHEN LENGTH(BRDMEMO)>130 THEN CONCAT(SUBSTR(BRDMEMO,1,130),'...') ELSE BRDMEMO END AS BRDMEMO , REG_ID , REG_DTTM, CHG_ID, CHG_DTTM , NOTICE_FLAG1 , NOTICE_FLAG2 , NOTICE_FLAG3 ,NOTICE_FLAG4 FROM TBL_NOTICE TB, (SELECT @ROWNUM := 0) R WHERE BRDDELETEFLAG='N' AND (NOTICE_FLAG1 = 'Y' OR NOTICE_FLAG2 = 'Y' OR NOTICE_FLAG3 = 'Y' OR NOTICE_FLAG4 = 'Y') )A ORDER BY A.NUM DESC LIMIT 4

SELECT A.* FROM( SELECT @ROWNUM := @ROWNUM + 1 AS NUM, BRDNO, BRDTYPE, BRDTITLE, BRDWRITER, DATE_FORMAT(BRDDATE,'%Y-%m-%d') BRDDATE, BRDHIT , CASE WHEN LENGTH(BRDMEMO)>130 THEN CONCAT(SUBSTR(BRDMEMO,1,130),'...') ELSE BRDMEMO END AS BRDMEMO , REG_ID , REG_DTTM, CHG_ID, CHG_DTTM , NOTICE_FLAG1 , NOTICE_FLAG2 , NOTICE_FLAG3 ,NOTICE_FLAG4 FROM TBL_BOARD TB, (SELECT @ROWNUM := 0) R WHERE BRDDELETEFLAG='N' AND (NOTICE_FLAG1 = 'Y' OR NOTICE_FLAG2 = 'Y' OR NOTICE_FLAG3 = 'Y' OR NOTICE_FLAG4 = 'Y') )A ORDER BY A.NUM DESC LIMIT 4

SELECT A.* FROM( SELECT @ROWNUM := @ROWNUM + 1 NUM, BRDNO, BRDTYPE, BRDTITLE, BRDWRITER, DATE_FORMAT(BRDDATE,'%Y-%m-%d') BRDDATE, BRDHIT , CASE WHEN LENGTH(BRDMEMO)>130 THEN CONCAT(SUBSTR(BRDMEMO,1,130),'...') ELSE BRDMEMO END AS BRDMEMO , REG_ID , REG_DTTM, CHG_ID, CHG_DTTM , NOTICE_FLAG1 , NOTICE_FLAG2 , NOTICE_FLAG3 ,NOTICE_FLAG4 FROM TBL_ISSUE TB, (SELECT @ROWNUM := 0) R WHERE BRDDELETEFLAG='N' AND (NOTICE_FLAG1 = 'Y' OR NOTICE_FLAG2 = 'Y' OR NOTICE_FLAG3 = 'Y' OR NOTICE_FLAG4 = 'Y') )A ORDER BY A.NUM DESC LIMIT 4

SELECT BRDNO, BRDTYPE, BRDTITLE, BRDWRITER, DATE_FORMAT(BRDDATE,'%Y-%m-%d') BRDDATE, BRDHIT , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBL_BOARDFILE WHERE BRDNO=TB.BRDNO AND BRDTYPE='N') FILECNT , (SELECT FILENAME FROM TBL_BOARDFILE WHERE BRDNO=TB.BRDNO AND BRDTYPE='N') FILENAME , (SELECT REALNAME FROM TBL_BOARDFILE WHERE BRDNO=TB.BRDNO AND BRDTYPE='N') REALNAME , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBL_BOARDREPLY WHERE BRDNO=TB.BRDNO AND REDELETEFLAG='N') REPLYCNT , REG_ID , REG_DTTM, CHG_ID, CHG_DTTM FROM TBL_NOTICE TB
ORDER BY BRDNO DESC LIMIT ${rowStart-1}, 10

SELECT BRDNO, BRDTYPE, BRDTITLE, BRDWRITER, DATE_FORMAT(BRDDATE,'%Y-%m-%d') BRDDATE, BRDHIT , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBL_BOARDFILE WHERE BRDNO=TB.BRDNO AND BRDTYPE='C') FILECNT , (SELECT FILENAME FROM TBL_BOARDFILE WHERE BRDNO=TB.BRDNO AND BRDTYPE='C') FILENAME , (SELECT REALNAME FROM TBL_BOARDFILE WHERE BRDNO=TB.BRDNO AND BRDTYPE='C') REALNAME , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBL_BOARDREPLY WHERE BRDNO=TB.BRDNO AND REDELETEFLAG='N') REPLYCNT , REG_ID , REG_DTTM, CHG_ID, CHG_DTTM FROM TBL_BOARD TB
ORDER BY BRDNO DESC LIMIT ${rowStart-1}, 10

SELECT BRDNO, BRDTYPE, BRDTITLE, BRDWRITER, DATE_FORMAT(BRDDATE,'%Y-%m-%d') BRDDATE, BRDHIT , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBL_BOARDFILE WHERE BRDNO=TB.BRDNO AND BRDTYPE='I') FILECNT , (SELECT FILENAME FROM TBL_BOARDFILE WHERE BRDNO=TB.BRDNO AND BRDTYPE='I') FILENAME , (SELECT REALNAME FROM TBL_BOARDFILE WHERE BRDNO=TB.BRDNO AND BRDTYPE='I') REALNAME , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBL_BOARDREPLY WHERE BRDNO=TB.BRDNO AND REDELETEFLAG='N') REPLYCNT , REG_ID , REG_DTTM, CHG_ID, CHG_DTTM FROM TBL_ISSUE TB
ORDER BY BRDNO DESC LIMIT ${rowStart-1}, 10

SELECT BRDNO, BRDTYPE, BRDTITLE, BRDWRITER, DATE_FORMAT(BRDDATE,'%Y-%m-%d') BRDDATE, BRDHIT , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBL_BOARDFILE WHERE BRDNO=TB.BRDNO AND BRDTYPE='I') FILECNT , (SELECT FILENAME FROM TBL_BOARDFILE WHERE BRDNO=TB.BRDNO AND BRDTYPE='I') FILENAME , (SELECT REALNAME FROM TBL_BOARDFILE WHERE BRDNO=TB.BRDNO AND BRDTYPE='I') REALNAME , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBL_BOARDREPLY WHERE BRDNO=TB.BRDNO AND REDELETEFLAG='N') REPLYCNT , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBL_LIKES WHERE BRDNO = TB.BRDNO)BRDLIKE , REG_ID , REG_DTTM, CHG_ID, CHG_DTTM FROM TBL_BOARD TB
AND REG_ID =#{id} ORDER BY BRDNO DESC LIMIT ${rowStart-1}, 10
mapper.insert:
SELECT IFNULL(MAX(BRDNO),0)+1 FROM TBL_NOTICE
INSERT INTO TBL_NOTICE ( BRDNO, BRDTYPE, BRDTITLE, BRDWRITER, BRDMEMO, BRDDATE, BRDHIT, BRDDELETEFLAG, REG_ID, REG_DTTM, CHG_ID, CHG_DTTM) VALUES ( #{brdno}, 'N', #{brdtitle}, #{brdwriter}, #{brdmemo}, NOW(), 0, 'N', #{reg_id}, NOW(), NULL, NULL )

SELECT IFNULL(MAX(BRDNO),0)+1 FROM TBL_BOARD
INSERT INTO TBL_BOARD ( BRDNO, BRDTYPE, BRDTITLE, BRDWRITER, BRDMEMO, BRDDATE, BRDHIT, BRDDELETEFLAG, REG_ID, REG_DTTM, CHG_ID, CHG_DTTM) VALUES ( #{brdno}, 'C', #{brdtitle}, #{brdwriter}, #{brdmemo}, NOW(), 0, 'N', #{reg_id}, NOW(), NULL, NULL )

SELECT IFNULL(MAX(BRDNO),0)+1 FROM TBL_ISSUE
INSERT INTO TBL_ISSUE ( BRDNO, BRDTYPE, BRDTITLE, BRDWRITER, BRDMEMO, BRDDATE, BRDHIT, BRDDELETEFLAG, REG_ID, REG_DTTM, CHG_ID, CHG_DTTM) VALUES ( #{brdno}, 'I', #{brdtitle}, #{brdwriter}, #{brdmemo}, NOW(), 0, 'N', #{reg_id}, NOW(), NULL, NULL )
mapper.select: SELECT BRDNO, BRDTYPE, BRDTITLE, BRDWRITER, BRDMEMO, BRDHIT, DATE_FORMAT(BRDDATE,'%Y-%m-%d') BRDDATE ,REG_ID, REG_DTTM, CHG_ID, CHG_DTTM , IFNULL((SELECT BRDNO FROM TBL_NOTICE WHERE BRDDELETEFLAG='N' AND BRDNO < #{brdno} ORDER BY BRDNO DESC LIMIT 1),(SELECT MIN(BRDNO)FROM TBL_NOTICE WHERE BRDDELETEFLAG='N') )PREV_BRDNO , IFNULL((SELECT BRDNO FROM TBL_NOTICE WHERE BRDDELETEFLAG='N' AND BRDNO > #{brdno} ORDER BY BRDNO LIMIT 1),(SELECT MAX(BRDNO)FROM TBL_NOTICE WHERE BRDDELETEFLAG='N') )NEXT_BRDNO FROM TBL_NOTICE WHERE BRDDELETEFLAG='N' AND BRDNO=#{brdno}

SELECT BRDNO, BRDTYPE, BRDTITLE, BRDWRITER, BRDMEMO, BRDHIT, DATE_FORMAT(BRDDATE,'%Y-%m-%d') BRDDATE ,REG_ID, REG_DTTM, CHG_ID, CHG_DTTM, NOW() SYSDATE , IFNULL((SELECT BRDNO FROM TBL_BOARD WHERE BRDDELETEFLAG='N' AND BRDNO < #{brdno} ORDER BY BRDNO DESC LIMIT 1),(SELECT MIN(BRDNO)FROM TBL_BOARD WHERE BRDDELETEFLAG='N') ) PREV_BRDNO , IFNULL((SELECT BRDNO FROM TBL_BOARD WHERE BRDDELETEFLAG='N' AND BRDNO > #{brdno} ORDER BY BRDNO LIMIT 1),(SELECT MAX(BRDNO)FROM TBL_BOARD WHERE BRDDELETEFLAG='N') ) NEXT_BRDNO , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBL_BOARDREPLY TB WHERE BRDNO=TB.BRDNO AND TB.BRDNO = #{brdno} AND REDELETEFLAG='N') REPLYCNT , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBL_LIKES TB WHERE BRDNO = TB.BRDNO AND TB.BRDNO = #{brdno})BRDLIKE , (SELECT IF(0,'N','Y') FROM TBL_LIKES TB WHERE BRDNO = TB.BRDNO AND TB.BRDNO = #{brdno} AND USER_ID = #{user_id})BRDLIKE_YN FROM TBL_BOARD WHERE BRDDELETEFLAG='N' AND BRDNO=#{brdno}

SELECT BRDNO, BRDTYPE, BRDTITLE, BRDWRITER, BRDMEMO, BRDHIT, DATE_FORMAT(BRDDATE,'%Y-%m-%d') BRDDATE ,REG_ID, REG_DTTM, CHG_ID, CHG_DTTM , IFNULL((SELECT BRDNO FROM TBL_ISSUE WHERE BRDDELETEFLAG='N' AND BRDNO < #{brdno} ORDER BY BRDNO DESC LIMIT 1),(SELECT MIN(BRDNO)FROM TBL_ISSUE WHERE BRDDELETEFLAG='N') )PREV_BRDNO , IFNULL((SELECT BRDNO FROM TBL_ISSUE WHERE BRDDELETEFLAG='N' AND BRDNO > #{brdno} ORDER BY BRDNO LIMIT 1),(SELECT MAX(BRDNO)FROM TBL_ISSUE WHERE BRDDELETEFLAG='N') )NEXT_BRDNO FROM TBL_ISSUE WHERE BRDDELETEFLAG='N' AND BRDNO=#{brdno}
mapper.delete: UPDATE TBL_NOTICE SET BRDDELETEFLAG='Y', CHG_ID = #{reg_id}, CHG_DTTM = NOW() WHERE BRDNO=#{brdno}
UPDATE TBL_BOARD SET BRDDELETEFLAG='Y', CHG_ID = #{reg_id}, CHG_DTTM = NOW() WHERE BRDNO=#{brdno}
UPDATE TBL_ISSUE SET BRDDELETEFLAG='Y', CHG_ID = #{reg_id}, CHG_DTTM = NOW() WHERE BRDNO=#{brdno}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM TBL_BOARDFILE WHERE BRDNO=#{brdno} AND BRDTYPE='N' ORDER BY FILENO DESC
SELECT * FROM TBL_BOARDFILE WHERE BRDNO=#{brdno} AND BRDTYPE='C' ORDER BY FILENO DESC
SELECT * FROM TBL_BOARDFILE WHERE BRDNO=#{brdno} AND BRDTYPE='I' ORDER BY FILENO DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_BOARDFILE ( BRDNO, BRDTYPE, FILENAME, REALNAME, FILESIZE, REG_ID, REG_DTTM, CHG_ID, CHG_DTTM ) VALUES ( #{parentPK}, #{brdtype}, #{filename}, #{realname}, #{filesize}, #{reg_id}, NOW(), NULL, NULL )
mapper.select: SELECT BRDNO ,BRDTYPE ,RENO ,REWRITER ,REMEMO ,REDATE ,REDELETEFLAG ,CONCAT(SUBSTRING(REG_ID,1,4),'***')REG_ID ,NOW() AS SYSDATE ,REG_DTTM FROM TBL_BOARDREPLY WHERE BRDNO=#{brdno} AND REDELETEFLAG='N' ORDER BY RENO
mapper.insert:
SELECT IFNULL(MAX(RENO),0)+1 FROM TBL_BOARDREPLY
INSERT INTO TBL_BOARDREPLY( BRDNO, BRDTYPE, RENO, REWRITER, REDELETEFLAG, REMEMO, REG_ID, REG_DTTM, CHG_ID, CHG_DTTM ) VALUES ( #{brdno}, 'C', #{reno}, #{rewriter}, 'N', #{rememo}, #{reg_id}, NOW(), NULL, NULL )

SELECT IFNULL(MAX(SEQ),0)+1 FROM TBL_LIKES
INSERT INTO TBL_LIKES( SEQ, USER_ID, BRDNO, REG_DTTM ) VALUES ( #{seq}, #{user_id}, #{brdno}, NOW() )
mapper.select: SELECT N.CNT+C.CNT+I.CNT FROM ( (SELECT COUNT(*) CNT FROM TBL_NOTICE WHERE 1=1 AND BRDDELETEFLAG='N' AND (BRDTITLE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword},'%' ) OR BRDMEMO LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword},'%' ) ) )N, (SELECT COUNT(*) CNT FROM TBL_BOARD WHERE 1=1 AND BRDDELETEFLAG='N' AND (BRDTITLE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword},'%' ) OR BRDMEMO LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword},'%' ) ) )C, (SELECT COUNT(*) CNT FROM TBL_ISSUE WHERE 1=1 AND BRDDELETEFLAG='N' AND (BRDTITLE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword},'%' ) OR BRDMEMO LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword},'%' ) ) )I )

SELECT BRDNO, BRDTYPE, BRDTITLE, BRDWRITER, CASE WHEN LENGTH(BRDMEMO)>30 THEN CONCAT(SUBSTR(BRDMEMO,1,30),'...') ELSE BRDMEMO END AS BRDMEMO, BRDHIT, DATE_FORMAT(BRDDATE,'%Y-%m-%d') BRDDATE ,REG_ID, REG_DTTM, CHG_ID, CHG_DTTM FROM TBL_NOTICE WHERE 1=1 AND BRDDELETEFLAG='N' AND (BRDTITLE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword},'%' ) OR BRDMEMO LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword},'%' ) ) UNION ALL SELECT BRDNO, BRDTYPE, BRDTITLE, BRDWRITER, CASE WHEN LENGTH(BRDMEMO)>30 THEN CONCAT(SUBSTR(BRDMEMO,1,30),'...') ELSE BRDMEMO END AS BRDMEMO, BRDHIT, DATE_FORMAT(BRDDATE,'%Y-%m-%d') BRDDATE ,REG_ID, REG_DTTM, CHG_ID, CHG_DTTM FROM TBL_BOARD WHERE 1=1 AND BRDDELETEFLAG='N' AND (BRDTITLE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword},'%' ) OR BRDMEMO LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword},'%' ) ) UNION ALL SELECT BRDNO, BRDTYPE, BRDTITLE, BRDWRITER, CASE WHEN LENGTH(BRDMEMO)>30 THEN CONCAT(SUBSTR(BRDMEMO,1,30),'...') ELSE BRDMEMO END AS BRDMEMO, BRDHIT, DATE_FORMAT(BRDDATE,'%Y-%m-%d') BRDDATE ,REG_ID, REG_DTTM, CHG_ID, CHG_DTTM FROM TBL_ISSUE WHERE 1=1 AND BRDDELETEFLAG='N' AND (BRDTITLE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword},'%' ) OR BRDMEMO LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword},'%' ) )

SELECT TB.BRDNO , TB.BRDTYPE , TB.BRDTITLE , TB.BRDWRITER , TB.BRDMEMO , DATE_FORMAT(TB.BRDDATE,'%Y-%m-%d') BRDDATE , TB.REG_ID , TB.REG_DTTM , TB.CHG_ID , TB.CHG_DTTM , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBL_BOARDREPLY WHERE BRDNO=TB.BRDNO AND REDELETEFLAG='N') REPLYCNT , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBL_LIKES WHERE BRDNO = TB.BRDNO)BRDLIKE , TF.FILENAME , TF.FILESIZE FROM TBL_BOARD TB LEFT OUTER JOIN TBL_BOARDFILE TF ON TB.BRDNO = TF.BRDNO WHERE 1=1 AND TB.BRDDELETEFLAG='N' ORDER BY TB.BRDNO DESC LIMIT 10

SELECT TB.BRDNO , TB.BRDTYPE , TB.BRDTITLE , TB.BRDWRITER , TB.BRDMEMO , DATE_FORMAT(TB.BRDDATE,'%Y-%m-%d') BRDDATE , TB.REG_ID , TB.REG_DTTM , TB.CHG_ID , TB.CHG_DTTM , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBL_BOARDREPLY WHERE BRDNO=TB.BRDNO AND REDELETEFLAG='N') REPLYCNT , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBL_LIKES WHERE BRDNO = TB.BRDNO)BRDLIKE FROM TBL_BOARD TB WHERE 1=1 AND TB.BRDDELETEFLAG='N' AND TB.BRDNO <= #{brdno} AND TB.BRDNO > #{brdno}-10 ORDER BY TB.BRDNO DESC
